name: MyPetTrade
overview:
MyPetTrade is a place where you can go to find useful free services relating to pets.

MyPetTrade offers many useful services for people in the UK for example they offer a free pet advertising service for breeders, re-homing centres and people who can not look after there pet any more. This service is also good for people looking for a pet of course.

Pet owners can look through the pet directory to find stuff like pet shops in their area or looking to find other pet websites. As well companies and websites can submit a listing in the directory.

There is also many other helpful things on the website like the pet encyclopedia what can be edited by any one, pet forums, free pet vouchers, a pet insurance page with pet insurers what can be rated and reviewed by normal people what makes it in impartial.

Also if you don’t want to use any of their free services, you can just enjoy reading their pet blog or watching some funny pet videos.

About the founder: the founder of mypettrade.co.uk is Richard Burles, who is 16 years old and lives in the UK. Richard came up with the idea when he was 14; to start a website related to pets and offer many free useful services to pet lovers. The company is in his dads name, (Peter Burles) as he is to young. The company/idea has been personally funded from Richard him self and some help from his Dad. the funding is around about Â£10,000 but the website has still got many other services coming up soon, for example a pet shopping comparison service.
